title: Every
second
person has at least once in their life thought about
moving
to another
country
start.subtitle: Feel like relocating but are not sure about the best place to live?
block: Take this short test and get a

questions.question: How good is your English?
answers: I listen to and watch a lot of content in English, but cannot speak it fluently

questions.question: What are your food preferences?
answers: Fish and meat - boiled, fried, baked.
Croissants for breakfast and paella for dinner.
Fast food: pizza or kebab will do.

questions.question: How do you feel about the Tradition vs Progress situation?
answers: I'm quite conservative, but a touch of liberalism wouldn't hurt

questions.question: Where would you spend your holiday?
answers: On a road trip to the Grand Canyon
On the beach. I dream about enjoying the sun and the sound of the sea.
I'd love to stroll through the historic streets and have a nice cup of coffee.

questions.question: What type of weather do you prefer?
answers: I don't like extreme heat, I'd rather stay somewhere cool
As long as there are no sudden changes in temperature, any place will do
I can't live without warm weather and the smell of the sea

questions.question: Which of these topic(s) sound more exciting to you?

attention: Our algorithm has analysed your answers. The result may surprise you!
result.text: After taking our test, most users become more motivated to relocate!
block: The result may be unexpectedly exciting.

price: Calls cost £6/call plus your phone company’s access charge

comments.text: Fun test. That food question made me laugh so hard! Idk buddy, it's fish and chips for me.
Mediterranean countries are cute but mountain views are just really something else
It's not bad, it helped me answer some of my long-standing questions.
I got Spain. I'm in the right place yay!
I think France is still the best option for my artsy and delicate personality
It's not really a call to relocate, but it's something to think about.
